duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the UX Team in designing intuitive and quality products through collaboration with product owners, developers, and stakeholders.
Champion for the customer and team with a user-centered and data-informed approach to design.
Resource planning and allocation, role/responsibility definition, and resource development.
Performance management, team planning/accounting, and service management.
Communicate and disseminate company and department related information to direct reports.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in UX Design, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
